list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slender rounded rod with tapered ends used in hand spinning to twist and wind thread from a mass of wool or flax held on a distaff.
a rod or pin serving as an axis that revolves or on which something revolves.
impale (a piece of paper) on a metal spindle for temporary filing purposes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: do not fold, spindle, or mutilate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không gấp, trục chính hoặc cắt xén
